body:
Comment 4: 
There are 3 sets of failures in your log, but before debugging the tricky ones, why
doesn't this one work?

--- FAIL: TestReaddirnames (0.00 seconds)
	os_test.go:193: open "/etc" failed: open /etc: permission denied
--- FAIL: TestReaddir (0.00 seconds)
	os_test.go:222: open "/etc" failed: open /etc: permission denied
FAIL
FAIL	os	0.069s


You don't have permission to even read /etc?

If you can'd do that, who knows what else you can't do.

Maybe your system doesn't want you to be able to do anything.

Perhaps you need to ask somebody else to install Go for you.
